mapper.select: select s.username as pname, s.id as oaid,p.fid as easid,b.fid as personId from oadb.system_users s left join lihua.t_pm_user p on s.easuser_id = p.fpersonid left join lihua.t_bd_person b on s.easuser_id =b.fid where s.id = #{oaId}

select s.username as pname, s.id as oaid,p.fid as easid,b.fid as personId,eh.id as oaid2019 from oadb.system_users s left join lihua.t_pm_user p on s.easuser_id = p.fpersonid left join lihua.t_bd_person b on s.easuser_id = b.fid left join ecology.hrmresource eh on eh.outkey = b.fid where eh.id = #{oaId2019} and p.fisdelete=0 and p.fislocked=0 and p.fforbidden=0

select s.username as pname, s.id as oaid,p.fid as easid,b.fid as personId from oadb.system_users s left join lihua.t_pm_user p on s.easuser_id = p.fpersonid left join lihua.t_bd_person b on s.easuser_id =b.fid where p.fid = #{easId}
